recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the grilled apricot puree by grilling apricot halves until caramelized, then blend to 0.5 oz with brown sugar{0.25%tsp} to taste.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, combine aged rum, fernet branca, lime juice, pineapple juice, cream of coconut, and grilled apricot puree. Shake with ice until well chilled, then strain into a glass. Garnish with mint and a grilled apricot half{1/2 piece} brushed with brown sugar{0.25%tsp} soaked in overproof rum, then light it up and finish with a pinch of cinnamon.
